titleStmt.title: Reflections on a pamphlet entitled Parliamentum pacificum
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.
Northleigh, John, 1657-1705. Parliamentum pacificum, or, The happy union of king & people in an healing Parlament heartily wish't for, and humbly recommended.

notesStmt.note: "Licensed by the Earl of Sutherland, and printed at London in March, 1688" [i.e. 1689].
Imperfect: Pages stained, with print show-through and loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
Item at 1418:11b is bound with: Dr. Burnets vindication of himself from the calumnies with which he is aspersed in a pamphlet entitled Parliamentum pacificum. [Amsterdam? : s.n., 1688?].
